intro.welcome: At MENEX Digital Menus ("MENEX", "we", "us", or "our"), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information when you use our digital menu SaaS platform and related services.
intro.warning: This policy applies to both Restaurant Owners (our registered clients) and End Users (restaurant customers who view the digital menus).

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.owners: 1.1. From Restaurant Owners: When you register for an account, we collect personal and business information necessary to provide our service. This includes your name, email address, secure password, and details about your restaurant (such as the restaurant's physical address and public phone number).
section1.endUsers: 1.2. From End Users (Menu Viewers): We respect the privacy of restaurant patrons. We do not collect any personal data from end users who scan QR codes or view digital menus. We do not track IP addresses, nor do we require end users to create an account.
section1.analytics: 1.3. Menu View Counts: We track the popularity of menus using a simple anonymous counter. When a menu is loaded, the system simply adds a "+1" to the total view count. This process does not identify the user or their device.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.purpose: 2.1. Service Delivery: We use the information provided by Restaurant Owners to create and manage accounts, host digital menus, and display the restaurant's contact information (phone and address) publicly on their digital menu.
section2.communications: 2.2. Communications & Marketing: We use your email address to send essential system notifications (e.g., password resets, account alerts). We may occasionally send promotional emails regarding new features, upgrades, or special offers. You may opt out of promotional emails at any time by contacting support.
section2.payments: 2.3. Payment Processing: MENEX processes subscription payments manually via direct bank transfer. We do not collect, process, or store credit card numbers or sensitive financial data on our servers.

section3.title: 3. Data Storage and Third Parties
section3.hosting: 3.1. Infrastructure: Our platform and databases are hosted securely using Render, a cloud hosting provider. Your data, including menu text and images, is stored on their secure servers.
section3.sharing: 3.2. No Data Selling: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal or business data to any third parties. Data is only shared with our hosting provider strictly for the purpose of operating the MENEX platform.
section3.cookies: 3.3. Cookies & Tracking: We use essential cookies strictly for the authentication and security of Restaurant Owners logging into the dashboard. We do not use Google Analytics or drop tracking cookies on End Users viewing the menus.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention and Deletion
section4.retention: 4.1. Expired Subscriptions: If your MENEX subscription expires due to non-payment, we retain your account data, menus, and images in our database so you can easily restore your service upon renewal. Public access to the menu will be disabled during this time.
section4.deletion: 4.2. Account Deletion: If you explicitly request to delete your account, all associated data is deleted immediately and permanently. This includes your personal details, restaurants, menus, and uploaded images. This action cannot be undone.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.rights: 5.1. Managing Your Data: Restaurant Owners have the right to access, update, or correct their personal and business information at any time through the MENEX dashboard.
section5.removal: 5.2. Right to Erasure: You may request the complete deletion of your account and data by contacting our support team.

footer.changes: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify Restaurant Owners of any significant changes via email.
